title: ProBlog: Blog Writer
description: ProBlog is a web application designed to simplify the process of creating professional and visually appealing blog posts. The application provides a user-friendly interface that allows users to easily create, edit, and customize their blog posts with a variety of templates, themes, and design elements. ProBlog also includes features such as drag-and-drop functionality, real-time collaboration, and integration with popular cloud storage services for seamless access and sharing of blog posts.
tech: Canvas API for slide design and rendering
Cloud Storage APIs (e.g., Google Drive, Dropbox) for file management and sharing
